snippet: Rafael Nadal rebounded from an early break to beat Marcel Granollers 6-3, 6-2 Wednesday, advancing to the third round of the Barcelona Open....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal rebounded from an early break to beat Marcel Granollers 6-3, 6-2 Wednesday, advancing to the third round of the Barcelona Open.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Beats Granollers, Reaches 3rd Round in Barcelona
headline.main: Nadal Beats Granollers, Reaches 3rd Round in Barcelona
